song.title: Here's My Heart
song.lyrics:
[1] .D I am found, I am Yours . F#m E I am loved, I'm made pure || . D I have life, I can breathe . F#m E I am healed, I am free
[2] . D You are strong, You are sure . F#m E You are life, You endure || . D You are good, always true . F#m E You are light breaking through
[C] .F#m D A Here's my heart Lord, .F#m D A here's my heart Lord || .F#m D A Here's my heart Lord, .F#m D A Speak what is true ---
[3] . D Bm You are more than enough . A E You are here, You are love || . D Bm You are hope, You are grace . A E You're all I have, You're everything
